description:
Welcome back Lorelei Lee. This hot blond is always welcome at Device Bondage. So let’s do something a little different today and see if we can jolt mega volts of electricity through Lorelei’s body.

Let’s make it tough for her though. She gets to choose between wrist suspension or getting fried. We have electricity flowing through her sensitive feet. Stand on the floor and get jolted, or avoid the floor and hang by your delicate wrists. Both options suck, which sucks less? Let’s find out…
title: Lorelei Lee Hot pussy on a copper roof.
